titleStmt.title: Unto the right honourable, the Lords of His Majesties Privie Council, the petition of Sir John Hill late collonel of the regiment at Fort-William.
titleStmt.author: Hill, John, Sir, fl. 1700.

notesStmt.note: Imperferct: tightly bound, with some loss of text.
Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
